turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to place an order please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a caramel machiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande size please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would 2% milk be okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, actually, can you make it nonfat?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nonfat milk, sure. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How many shots in the grande?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It has 2 shots of espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, can you make it triple?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, so triple grande caramel machiato with nonfat milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location are you picking it up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one on Gallatine Pike in Madison.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1907 Gallatin Pike North, Madison, Tennessee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it on the visa card on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your drink will be ready in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
